thread.title: Pirates' Sean Rodriguez Pummels a Gatorade Cooler After Benches Clear in NL Wild Card Game
thread.title_full: Pirates' Sean Rodriguez Pummels a Gatorade Cooler After Benches Clear in NL Wild Card Game

author: Carmen Cox
title: Pirates' Sean Rodriguez Pummels a Gatorade Cooler After Benches Clear in NL Wild Card Game
text:
Share Article 
Rob Carr/Getty Images (PITTSBURGH) â€” Pittsburgh Pirates first baseman Sean Rodriguez turned the National League Wild Card game into the Wild West Wednesday night â€” landing more hits than his entire team in a bizarre dugout brawl with a Gatorade cooler.The incident, captured on video, happened during the 7th inning of the game with the Cubs, when Chicago's pitcher was beaned at the plate. The Pirates were down 4-0 at that point.Both benches cleared, but when the incensed Rodriguez returned to the dugout, he unleashed a grand slam on the cooler. 
The cooler eventually fell down onto the ground.In the wake of the incident, a "Pirates Water Cooler" parody Twitter account emerged. What have I done wrong? ðŸ˜­ â€” Pirates Water Cooler (@piratescooler) October 8, 2015 Guess Rodriguez is a Powerade guy... â€” Pirates Water Cooler (@piratescooler) October 8, 2015
